alert.note: Alert for Chenango; Cortland; Madison; Southern Cayuga; Tompkins (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 12 at 10:13AM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A SNOW SQUALL WILL AFFECT PARTS OF CHENANGO...CORTLAND...SOUTHERN CAYUGA...MADISON...AND TOMPKINS COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A snow squall accompanied by winds of up to 30 MPH which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than a quarter of a mile. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 1013 AM EST, a snow squall was along a line extending from near Scott to near Groton and moving east at 40 MPH. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Cortland, Homer, Groton, Preble, Scott, Truxton, Solon, Cincinnatus, Otselic and McGraw. This includes the following highway exits... New York Interstate 81 between 10 and 13. SAFETY INFO... Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this squall. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads may lead to accidents. &&

area.areaDesc: Chenango; Cortland; Madison; Southern Cayuga; Tompkins
